text: I'm not able to do overlay (Modal or Panel) with Tag UI component. Same code works with Button as given in the example. The docs say overlay prop works with Button, Tag, Link, Image
Also, is it possible to add custom color or background color to my Text, Box, Flex, Tag, Button, or any other related component.
Check the scopes of the private app in dev account and make sure they line up with what you have for production?
